title: PM to visit flood-hit south Punjab &  Balochistan today
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 05 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will visit today the flood-affected areas of South Punjab including Dera Ghazi Khan,Â  Rojhan and Rajanpur, and also Lasbela in South Balochistan.
The prime minister will review the relief operations in the flood affected areas of the South Punjab and South Balochistan.
He will be given a briefing regarding the ongoing relief and rehabilitation measures in the flood-affected areas.
